title: Ticket #6285: Remove glite-ce-cream-utils build dependency
description: The RPM glite-ce-cream-utils is marked as a BuildRequires for cream on non-UW RPM builds, but the cream gahp compiles just fine without it. Could you please remove the dependency? It would allow OSG to drop glite-ce-cream-utils.
remarks: Dupe of #6284. My bad.
creator: matyas
